Package rl.sqltrainer.persistence

Provides persistence functionality for the SQL Trainer.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsciiFileHandler
    Simple helper class for reading ASCII files into Strings.
    DBConnectionHandler
    Class, responsible for communication with a database using JDBC.
    XMLFileHandler
    This class implements transformations between internal object-oriented representations and external XML representations of domain objects for the SQL Trainer.
    XMLFileHandler.MyErrorHandler
    Simple handler for XML parser exceptions.

Package rl.sqltrainer.persistence Description

Provides persistence functionality for the SQL Trainer. The XMLFileHandler strongly depends on the domain object classes of the SQL Trainer. The other classes of this package are quite general and can be used in other projects, too.
